entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gameti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
